msIdentifier.repository: Library at the Herbert D. Katz Center for Advanced Judaic Studies

msContents.summary: Leaf from a book of hours made in France, circa 1490. The text, Psalm 88.7-18, is written in Gothic script (textualis semi-quadrata) in 16 long lines. Initials in gold on blue and pink grounds.

msItem.title: Manuscript leaf from a book of hours.
msItem.author: Catholic Church

keywords.term: Catholic Church--Prayers and devotions--Early works to 1800
